name: Perforated panel, 20% open, 20 mm 149 kg/m3 absorber
description:
This material is built up of 3 layers. From the surface to the back: 
1: Panel with circular perforations with a thickness of 12 [mm], density of 700 [kg/m3], hole diameter of 15 [mm],  area of 700 [mm2] per hole, and the opening ratio is 20%., 
2: Porous absorber (rockwool) with a thickness of 20 [mm] and density of 149.3 [kg/m3]., 
3: Rigid backing

name: Cotton curtains draped to 88% area
description: Curtain made of cotton (0.475 kg/m2) draped to 88% area

name: Single pane of glass, >4 mm
description: Thick single pane of glass. Thickness over 4 mm

name: Acoustic plaster 68 mm thick
description: Acoustic plaster with thickness of 50 - 70 mm

name: Acoustic ceiling (rockwool), 40 mm , 100 kg/m3, suspended 200 mm
description:
1. Porous absorber (rockwool) of thickness 40 mm, flow resistivity 55000 Pa s/m2, and density 100 kg/m3 
2. 200 mm thick air cavity.

name: Pressure release
description: Flat real valued reflection coefficient of -1. Can for example be used to model an open window
